message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $20,000. I think it could really benefit you and it's a fantastic deal.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $12,000 is significantly below my minimum.  Could you do $18,000? I'm willing to compromise to make this work.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $15,000?
